Pre-Game Insights: England and India are set to face off in the 2nd semi-final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
India are unbeaten in the tournament, while England have reached the semi-finals with some hiccups
The match is a rematch of the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final where England defeated India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at Guyana on June 27, 2024
The match will start at 10.30am local time
Others: The match will determine which team will advance to the final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
